rows.label: bf08180100_0020
rows.name: They are born from Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf08180100_0030
rows.name:
And when their fire burns out... they return 
to the Divine Beast that bore them.

rows.label: bf08180100_0040
rows.name:
Eventually, Blades that have returned to the
Divine Beast themselves transform into Divine Beasts...

rows.label: bf08180100_0060
rows.name: We'll end up like that, eventually?

rows.label: bf08180100_0080
rows.name: It's the principle of this world...

rows.label: bf08180100_0090
rows.name:
When a Blade becomes a Divine Beast, it loses all 
memories of its life as a Blade.

rows.label: bf08180100_0100
rows.name: Just like returning to a core.

rows.label: bf08180100_0120
rows.name:
They probably shared the fate of the Iira Divine Beast 
that served as their mother when it died.
